english.segment1: [Verse]. Bring us love, You who are love. Bring us peace, You who are peace
english.segment2: We need love, O divine love. We need your peace, Your merciful peace
english.segment3: Bring us love, O divine love. Bring us peace, You who are peace
english.segment4: [Pre-Chorus]. How gracefully. You come along. How gracefully. You come
english.segment5: [Chorus]. Glory, glory, glory. God is near to each one of us. Holy, holy, holy. God is near to each one of us
english.segment6: [Bridge]. O grant us reprieve from the fighting
english.segment7: So we just rest our. head on the shoulder of the One. In His arms we're forever. grateful for the contact. O so blessed for a moment's rest. Weeping knowing we have been touched. Weeping knowing we have been touched. O we have been touched
